name: sofiatraffic-schedules
description: A tool designed to take Sofia public transit schedules and convert them into machine readeble format..

scripts.build: node build.js && npm run build_stops && npm run build_metadata && npm run build_sitemap
scripts.build-github: npm run prebuild && npx parcel build ./src/index.html --public-url ./sofiatraffic-schedules
scripts.dev: npm run prebuild && npx parcel serve ./docs/index.html

author: Dimitar5555
